name: Regarding Online Admit Cards for February-March 2025 SSC (10th) Examination

details.description: This notification informs students about the availability of online admit cards for the upcoming SSC examinations scheduled in February-March 2025.

name: Procedure for Online Submission of Marks and Grades for February-March 2025 HSC (12th) and SSC (10th) Examinations

details.description: Guidelines for schools and colleges on the online submission process of marks and grades for practicals, orals, internal evaluations, and other categories for the February-March 2025 examinations.

name: SSC March 2025 Practical Learning Guidelines for Vocational Subjects under NSQF

details.description: This notification provides practical learning guidelines for vocational subjects X1 91, 92, and 93 under the National Skills Qualifications Framework (NSQF) for the March 2025 SSC examinations.
